characters: A child in a blue jacket suddenly appears from the right side of the image, a woman in a pink jacket appears later to assist the child.
summary: The video sequence shows a vehicle driving at night on a well-lit street. Initially, the road appears clear, but at around 2 seconds, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, directly into the vehicle's path. The child was previously hidden by a physical obstruction (a parked vehicle). This is a clear case of 'ghost probing'. The vehicle needs to take immediate action to avoid a collision. Subsequently, a woman in a pink jacket appears to assist the child.
actions: The child suddenly appears from the right side of the image, directly into the vehicle's path. The woman in a pink jacket appears later to assist the child.
key_objects: Child in blue jacket, woman in pink jacket, parked vehicles on the right side of the image.
